amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for basic energy science research by $158,309,900 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds in the Secience account by $158,309,900 and increase the funds in the Spending Reduction account by $158,309,900.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A025) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A025) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
